description: After a rough day of training and screaming at hopelessly inept recruits on the obstacle course, sergeants Ricky Sinz and Roman Ragazzi team up for a good game of hide the dick with Roman the happy recipient. Ricky demands an inspection of Roman's hot bod, admiring his big muscles. Soon Roman is on his knees servicing his comrade. But Roman wants more and offers up his ass to Ricky, who obliges with an aggressive fuck on a pile of artillery shell boxes. Roman shoots with Ricky still inside followed by Ricky who spills seed all over Roman's hairy chest. Ragazzi, who is one of Raging Stallion's top stars, gives the finest performance of his career in what will surely be an award-nominated scene.
title: Grunts The New Recruits
